scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] ] -o dist/index.js js/index.js
scripts.dev: budo js/index.js:index.js --open --dir=dist --css=app.css -- -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] ]
